Summary: firey like sphere blue with white like tails
divs: Sighting Detailssitting on my porch at above time looked to my right and saw this fast moving ball, very blue in color with white tail just over the trees (30.50ft) in the air going east to west on Station Ave towards Bristol Pike. I thought that it was a meteor. I followed it from my porch to over the treeline on Bristol Pike (apprx. 400 600ft).
trends: There have been 216 other sightings in Philadelphia
There was one other sighting in Philadelphia on or around June 25th 2008
